【Introduction】
Geneva Business School is a 21st-century Swiss education institution with campuses in Geneva, Barcelona, and Madrid. We offer students a practical business education with many options for internships and developmental activities, sharing the experiences of a wide and diverse business ecosystem. Our Geneva campus is located in the heart of Geneva’s International district, one of the largest centers of diplomatic, financial, and business activity in the world. Our students enjoy state-of-the-art facilities and exclusive access to the United Nations Library for a truly international environment.

【Admission requirements】
1. Bachelor of International Management: https://gbsge.com/programs/bachelor-of-international-management/entry-requirements/
2. Master of International Management: https://gbsge.com/programs/master-of-international-management/entry-requirements/

【Specializations】
1.Bachelor of International Management: https://gbsge.com/programs/#tabs-caabcb
2. Master of International Management: https://gbsge.com/programs/#tabs-caabcb
Please remember that we offer a Bachelor of International Management and a Master of International Management with several specializations.
Our Programs are fully Swiss in its DNA and International in its delivery (all in English, 95% International Students, 100 nationalities, international faculty...).

【Fees】
1. The fee for a Bachelor student in our Barcelona or Madrid campus would be 5962,5€.
2. The fee for a Master student in our Barcelona or Madrid campus would be 4496,25€.

【Process】
The deadline for nominations is January 30.  
Please provide your name, program, email address to OIA and they will nominate to us.
Our spring semester which starts in March 2024.
